text:
‘Good-bye,’ he said abruptly, walking to the door.

‘Stop, stop! You queer fish.’

‘I don’t want to,’ he replied, pulling away.

---

‘Then why have you come? Are you mad?’

‘I see I want nothing at all...’

‘Stay a minute, you sweep! You are a madman!’

**PAGE SUMMARY:** The conversation reveals a sense of isolation and a rejection of help, highlighting the protagonist's internal struggle and desire for independence.
